Name: Google Cloud Platform VPC Flow Logs
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The Google Cloud Platform (GCP) VPC Flow Logs enable you to capture network traffic activity at the VPC level, allowing you to monitor access patterns, analyze network performance, and detect potential threats across GCP resources.

NOTE: Microsoft recommends installation of "GCPVPCFlowLogsCCPDefinition" (via Codeless Connector Platform). This connector is build on the Codeless Connector Platform (CCP), which uses the Log Ingestion API, which replaces ingestion via the deprecated HTTP Data Collector API. CCP-based data connectors also support Data Collection Rules (DCRs) offering transformations and enrichment.
BasePath: C:\One\Azure-Sentinel\Solutions\Google Cloud Platform VPC Flow Logs
